title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: members, contributors, leaders pledge make participation community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, body size, visible invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity expression, level experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, sexual identity orientation. pledge act interact ways contribute open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, healthy community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders responsible clarifying enforcing standards acceptable behavior take appropriate fair corrective action response behavior deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful. Community leaders right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, communicate reasons moderation decisions appropriate.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported community leaders responsible enforcement [INSERT CONTACT METHOD]. complaints reviewed investigated promptly fairly. community leaders obligated respect privacy security reporter incident.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders follow Community Impact Guidelines determining consequences action deem violation Code Conduct:

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Use inappropriate language behavior deemed unprofessional unwelcome community. Consequence: private, written warning community leaders, providing clarity around nature violation explanation behavior inappropriate. public apology may requested.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: violation single incident series actions. Consequence: warning consequences continued behavior. interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, specified period time. includes avoiding interactions community spaces well external channels like social media. Violating terms may lead temporary permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: serious violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior. Consequence: temporary ban sort interaction public communication community specified period time. public private interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, allowed period. Violating terms may lead permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Demonstrating pattern violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior, harassment individual, aggression toward disparagement classes individuals. Consequence: permanent ban sort public interaction within community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant, version 2.0, available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/0/ code_of_conduct.html. Community Impact Guidelines inspired Mozilla’s code conduct enforcement ladder. answers common questions code conduct, see FAQ https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq. Translations available https:// www.contributor-covenant.org/translations.

text: Thanks goes wonderful people (emoji key): project follows -contributors specification. Contributions kind welcome!

what: DNH4: Crawling for Daum News Text — DNH4-package
title: DNH4: Crawling for Daum News Text — DNH4-package
text: Provides utils get Korean text sample news articles Daum popular news portal service Korea.

title: DNH4: Crawling for Daum News Text — DNH4-package
text: Maintainer: Chanyub Park mrchypark@gmail.com (ORCID)

title: Get All Comment — getAllComment
text: Get daum news comments

title: Get All Comment — getAllComment
text: turl like 'http://v.media.daum.net/v/20161117210603961'. sort can select RECOMMEND, LATEST. RECOMMEND Default.

title: Get All Comment — getAllComment
text: [tibble][tibble::tibble-package]

title: Get Comment — getComment
text: Get daum news comments

title: Get Comment — getComment
code: getComment(   turl,   limit = 10,   offset = 0,   parentId = 0,   sort = c("RECOMMEND", "LATEST"),   type = c("df", "list") )

title: Get Comment — getComment
text: turl like 'http://v.media.daum.net/v/20161117210603961'. limit number comment. Default 10. offset comment number start. Default 0. parentId Default 0. sort can select RECOMMEND, LATEST. RECOMMEND Default. type return type. Default tibble. may sometimes warn message.

title: Get Comment — getComment
text: [tibble][tibble::tibble-package]

title: Get Content — getContent
text: Get daum news content links.

title: Get Content — getContent
text: turl daum news link.

title: Get Content — getContent
text: [tibble][tibble::tibble-package] (url,datetime,press,title,content).

title: Get News Main Categories — getMainCategory
text: Get daum news main category names ids recently.

title: Get News Main Categories — getMainCategory
text: fresh TRUE, get data internet.  Default FALSE return cache.

title: Get News Main Categories — getMainCategory
text: Get data.frame(chr:cate_name, chr:url).

code: getMainCategory() #>       cate_name       url #> 2          사회   society #> 3          정치  politics #> 4          경제  economic #> 5          국제   foreign #> 6          문화   culture #> 7          연예 entertain #> 8        스포츠    sports #> 9            IT   digital #> 10         칼럼 editorial #> 11     보도자료     press #> 12 자동생성기사   botnews

title: Get Max Page Number — getMaxPageNum
text: Get Max Page Number

title: Get Max Page Number — getMaxPageNum
text: turl target url include breakingnews, category url, date without regDate like . 'https://news.daum.net/breakingnews/politics/administration?regDate=20220305'

title: Get Max Page Number — getMaxPageNum
text: Get numeric

text: categoryUrl Main category url daum news. 1 value passible.  Default society. fresh TRUE, get data internet.  Default FALSE return cache.

title: Get News Sub Categories — getSubCategory
text: Get data.frame(chr:sub_cate_name, chr:url).

title: Get News Sub Categories — getSubCategory
code: getSubCategory() #>    sub_cate_name                                      url #> 2      사건/사고             /breakingnews/society/affair #> 3           인물             /breakingnews/society/people #> 4           교육          /breakingnews/society/education #> 5         미디어              /breakingnews/society/media #> 6           여성              /breakingnews/society/woman #> 7           복지            /breakingnews/society/welfare #> 8       사회일반             /breakingnews/society/others #> 9           노동              /breakingnews/society/labor #> 10          환경        /breakingnews/society/environment #> 11          전국             /breakingnews/society/nation #> 12          서울       /breakingnews/society/nation/seoul #> 13        수도권       /breakingnews/society/nation/metro #> 14          강원     /breakingnews/society/nation/gangwon #> 15          충청 /breakingnews/society/nation/chungcheong #> 16          경상  /breakingnews/society/nation/gyeongsang #> 17          전라      /breakingnews/society/nation/jeolla #> 18          제주        /breakingnews/society/nation/jeju #> 19      지역일반      /breakingnews/society/nation/others   getSubCategory("politics") #>    sub_cate_name                                   url #> 21   행정/지자체 /breakingnews/politics/administration #> 31     국회/정당       /breakingnews/politics/assembly #> 41          북한          /breakingnews/politics/north #> 51      정치일반         /breakingnews/politics/others #> 61     외교/국방       /breakingnews/politics/dipdefen #> 71        청와대      /breakingnews/politics/president

title: Get Url List — getUrlList
text: turl target url daum news.

title: Get Url List — getUrlList
text: [tibble][tibble::tibble-package](news_title, news_links).

title: DNH4 0.1.12
text: CRAN release: 2022-03-09 카테고리 리턴 함수에 cache를 추가하였습니다. Add cache categories function.

title: DNH4 0.1.11
text: CRAN release: 2021-09-06 Cran 정책에 맞게 license 파일을 수정했습니다. Fix LICENSE file.

title: DNH4 0.1.10
text: Cran 등록을 위한 수정 버전입니다. Tiny change cran submit

title: DNH4 0.1.8
text: 다음 뉴스의 댓글 구조가 바뀌어서 getComment 함수를 대응 개발 하였습니다. Fix getComment function change site.

title: DNH4 0.1.6
text: getAllComment() 함수의 limit 100 이상 동작시 오류를 수정하였습니다. Fix getAllComment() error occurs request limit 100.

title: DNH4 0.1.5
text: getComment() 함수의 df 변환시 오류를 수정하였습니다. getAllComment() 함수를 추가하였습니다. Fix getComment() error occurs df transform. Add getAllComment() function.

title: DNH4 0.1.4
text: getComment() 함수의 auth 부분을 수정하였습니다. getComment() 함수에서 encoding 부분을 지정하였습니다. getContent() 함수에서 url 체크를 변경하였습니다. Fix auth part getComment() function. Set encoding remove message getComment() function. Change url check getContent() function.

title: DNH4 0.1.4
text: getComment() 함수의 결과에서 user_icon 컬럼을 제거하였습니다. Removed user_icon column result getComment() function.

title: DNH4 0.1.4
text: getContent() 함수내 datetime 객체를 글자수 처리 방식에서 정규식 처리 방식으로 수정하였습니다. modified datetime object getContent () function regular expression method character processing method.

title: DNH4 0.1.4
text: getComment() 함수의 결과에서 user_url 컬럼을 제거하였습니다. Removed user_url column result getComment() function.

title: DNH4 0.1.4
text: getComment() 함수의 출력이 data.frame으로 잘 동작하도록 개선했습니다. output getCommentb() function modified work data.frame.

title: DNH4 0.1.4
text: getComment() 함수가 댓글이 없을때 NULL, 한개 일때, 여러개 일때 동작하도록 개선했습니다. getComment () function improved work comments, NULL, one, several.

title: DNH4 0.1.4
text: getComment() 함수에서 limit 인자에 을 사용하면 전체를 가져오도록 추가했습니다. getComment() function added thelimit argument get whole comments.

title: DNH4 0.1.4
text: 패키지에 대한 변경 사항을 추적하는 NEWS.md 파일을 추가했습니다. 다음 뉴스 덧글을 얻기 위해 getComment() 함수를 추가했습니다. stringr 패키지의 종속성을 제거했습니다. Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Added getComment() function get daum news comments. Removed dependency stringr package.

title: DNH4 0.1.4
text: 다음 뉴스 개편으로 인해 날짜 형식이 조정되어 반영하였습니다. 리다이렉트되는 주소를 확인해서 뉴스 사이트가 아니면 우회합니다. date format adjusted due following news revision. Check redirected address bypass news site.

title: DNH4 0.1.4
text: project start
